data.title: Waitakere Rugby Club
data.text:
Facilities

Fields

Our number one ground offers an impressive seated grandstand that can seat 3000 people. The ground is immaculately kept, so much so that it is regularly used by the All Blacks for training purposes.

The club also has 2 additional grounds behind the trusts stadium; all set in beautiful spacious park-like grounds, which include the Chris Timms Memorial Jetty and a fully featured childrens park.

Overflow games are held at our secondary ground - Te Atatu South Park, Essex Street, Te Atatu South. We are proud to have quality facilities as part of the Trusts Stadium which is situated on 11 hectares providing facilities for multiple sports and extensive parking.

Club

Located in the Grandstand building of the Trusts Stadium, Our clubrooms are large, and offer a fantastic view of the number one ground. Boasting a bar and catering facilities in the main salon, - which also allows separation of the main area via a sliding wall to allow multiple functions or events in parallel.

​​​​​​​

Clubrooms

The clubrooms are of generous proportions, and provide a rostrum stage, and facilities including a large screen and TVs throughout the space.

Our facilities are regularly used for events, wedding receptions and other celebrations and corporate events such as conferences or workshops.

Enquiries about our facilities can be made to chairman@waitakererugby.co.nz
